item.title: Authorization in a microservices world
item.description: Authorization? How hard can it be? I am pretty sure that others have already solved it. We are not the first ones doing microservices. It should be easy to integrate what's already out there.

item.title: Remote work tips - How NOT to snap
item.description: Lot of these articles going around these days due to COVID-19, but I felt like giving my two cents since I’ve been a freelancer in the past, mostly working from home, so I know how it feels like.

item.title: COVID-19
item.description: We are facing an unprecedented situation in human history. The COVID-19 virus has affected everyones life and is testing us in ways that we have not been tested before. It has been brutally attacking our health and our economies and imprisoned us in our own homes for our own safety but we need to be patient and go through this together.
